Headline: #151 Sheridan & #156 LaSalle Temporary Reroute near Belmont/Sheridan-Broadway
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan & 156 LaSalle buses temp. rerouted NB: Sheridan, Belmont, Addison & Halsted; SB Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan & #156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Belmont/Sheridan-Broadway.

Northbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Belmont, Addison and Halsted.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: PinkLine trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 95th/Dan Ryan and 79th/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th/Dan Ryan and 79th/Dan Ryan due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th/Dan Ryan and 79th/Dan Ryan due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and 79th at this time.

  • Shuttle buses are available between 95th/Dan Ryan and 79th/Dan Ryan to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such These may include #29 State bus to provide connecting service in both directions.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
